p: The susceptibility of Ae. aegypti from Madeira Island for CHIKV was studied using a viral strain belonging to Asian lineage, as the current circulating lineage in the Americas [ 10]. Our results showed that local Ae. aegypti can transmit CHIKV very efficiently: Funchal and Paúl do Mar populations were both highly susceptible to CHIKV infection, with similar infection rates [Chi-square test: P > 0.05; 3 dpi ( χ 2 = 1.02, df = 1, P = 0.31); 6 dpi ( χ 2 = 1.02, df = 1, P = 0.31)] ranging from 95 to 100% after 3 dpi (Table 1).
